mandate.title: SEPA direct debit mandate
mandate.content: By signing this mandate form, you authorise %company% to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions from %company%. Note: As part of your rights, you are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited. Your rights regarding this SEPA mandate are explained in a statement that you can obtain from your bank.
mandate.error: Please accept the SEPA direct debit mandate in order to continue.
